channel.title: Multiphase flows on MultiForM research group
channel.description: Recent content in Multiphase flows on MultiForM research group

item.title: Federico Municchi
item.description: Bio I am an Energy Engineer with MSc in Energy and Nuclear Engineering and a PhD in Process and Particle Engineering. My expertise lies in the Multiscale and numerical modelling of multiphase and porous systems. I obtained my PhD in process and particle engineering from the Graz University of Technology. There, I worked within the European project EU FP7-604656 “NanoSim” in collaborations with industrial partner like SINTEF and DCS Computing.
